text:
9 services and applications for those who want to follow book updates
05 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Dmitry Sazhko
Exciting adventure novels, horrors, dramas, thrillers with a twisted plot - and everything is just the freshest.
1. LitRes



A large online library with an extensive collection of books: there are more than a million publications and 48,000 of them are available for free. Here, and modern fiction, and classics, and manuals on self-development and training - the choice is huge.
Fresh works, as you might guess, are in the "Novelties" section. True, in a mobile application they cannot be sorted by genre - such an opportunity is present only in the web interface.
By the way, at LitRes you can get books for rent for two weeks for free. To do this, you will need a special library card with a username and password, which can be obtained at the district library. A list of institutions where this can be done is available here.

LitRes ‚Üí

Google Play Read books online Developer: LitRes Price: Free
App Store Read the best books online Developer: LITRES GLOBAL S.A. Price: Free
2. LiveLib



LiveLib is a kind of social network for book lovers: here you can gather in interest groups, write reviews and discuss what you read with friends. The service does not sell books itself, but tells where to buy them at a discount.
You can see book novelties, as well as only announced publications, divided by genre. Or use the recommendations wizard: just indicate your favorite genres and works, and the service will pick up something similar.
In addition, the site publishes a bunch of collections of works united by common themes, and ratings of the best books are compiled.

LiveLib ‚Üí

Google Play Livelib.ru - book recommendation service Developer: LiveLib Price: Free
App Store LiveLib Developer: Zhivaya Biblioteka OOO Price: Free
3. Bookmate



Another online library where you do not buy individual books, but rather pay for a subscription to all publications contained in it ‚Äî and there are more than 12 million of them. Note that books are available only through the Bookmate website or application - you cannot download and open them in a third-party reader.
Section of new products, of course, is present. But, unfortunately, there is no sorting at all, so science fiction and thrillers are mixed with books on self-development.

Bookmate ‚Üí

Google Play Bookmate - reading books is easy. Developer: Bookmate Price: Free
App Store Bookmate. Books and audio books Developer: Bookmate Limited Price: Free
4. Readly



A service with personalized book recommendations. Evaluate the read works, and they will offer you something similar, as well as suggest where it is better to buy in electronic or paper form.
It is also convenient to track news through Readly - a special page is provided for this. The works are divided by genre, you can add them to your own reading list and share your favorite editions with friends.

Readly ‚Üí

5. ReadRate



The ReadRate news section also has something to profit from. It publishes a selection of new books of the month, as well as the names of the expected works, which are yet to be published. They can be added to the list for reading, so as not to forget to purchase on occasion, and recommend to friends. ReadRate does not sell books on its own, but can help you find where to buy them.

ReadRate ‚Üí

6. Libs.ru



This site publishes collections of new books of the month by genre - prose, detective stories and thrillers, science fiction and non-fiction. The service allows you to download an excerpt from a book or listen to a fragment in audio format and offers places where you can profitably buy the full text.
Seekers of the freshest should look into the sections "Best Books of the Day" and "Best Books of the Week", which contains only the latest editions.

Libs.ru ‚Üí

7. MyBook



MyBook is an electronic library with a convenient page of new products, where you can find the latest editions for a week or a month. Each month the collection is replenished with a couple of thousands of new books.
In addition, the service periodically publishes interesting thematic collections, for example, the best new books about business, novelties from the number of detective stories, or fresh foreign prose. Separately, it is worth mentioning the section "News of the week", where every seven days the newly published books appear.
You cannot buy books separately here - pay for your subscription and read what you want through the website or mobile application.

MyBook ‚Üí

Google Play MyBook - library and books Developer: MyBook Price: Free
App Store Books and audiobooks MyBook Developer: Zhivaya Biblioteka OOO Price: Free
8. Labyrinth



Through the site of this bookstore, you can also track new items. Please note, however, that Labyrinth trades only in paper editions. But no one forbids finding through him the names of fresh books, and then downloading them electronically somewhere else.
The service stands out thanks to a well-tuned filtering system - it‚Äôs easy to select only those genres and works that will be of interest to you. Books can be sorted by genre, alphabet, indicate how new they should be (for example, those published in the last three days, or week, or month). In addition to the literature itself, there are also comic books with manga.

Labyrinth ‚Üí

Google Play Labyrinth.ru - bookstore Developer: Labirint LLC Price: Free
App Store Labyrinth.ru - bookstore Developer: Labirint LLC Price: Free
9. Science Fiction Laboratory



This site is just a storehouse of interesting books for science fiction lovers. In addition, here you can find information about fantasy, horror and mysticism. You can‚Äôt download or buy books here, but to see the bibliography of certain authors and find out which new works have been published and which have been announced are quite.
At Fantlaba there is also a system of recommendations: register, start to rate books already read, and the service will pick up something new for you according to your preferences.

Science Fiction Laboratory ‚Üí
